meanings.definition: Crossing or extending across an ocean.
meanings.sent1: The ship embarked on a transoceanic journey to reach the distant island.
meanings.sent2: The transoceanic flight from New York to London was long but exciting.
meanings.sent3: The penguin dreamed of taking a transoceanic vacation to the tropical beaches.
meanings.sent4: Her transoceanic love for him knew no bounds, spanning the vast sea between them.
meanings.sent5: The transoceanic view from the top of the lighthouse was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Relating to or situated beyond an ocean.
meanings.sent1: The transoceanic trade routes connected continents and cultures.
meanings.sent2: The transoceanic cable linked the two continents for instant communication.
meanings.sent3: The pirate's treasure map led to a transoceanic adventure full of surprises.
meanings.sent4: Their transoceanic friendship remained strong despite the distance.
meanings.sent5: The transoceanic horizon seemed to merge the sky and sea into one vast expanse.
